action.action-desc: Mr. Timmons introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to limit the face value of coins.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cancel the Coin Act.

section.header: Limitation on face value of coins
section.text: Section 5112 of title 31, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting having such nominal, or face, values as the Secretary may determine but not in any case exceeding $200 after platinum coins; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: The Secretary may not mint or issue any coin having a nominal, or face, value exceeding $200.
